pages.text: I have heard tell of a $(thing)powerful Artifact$(0) encountered on the High Seas. Indeed, my colleagues describe it as $(thing)an Orb containing Immense Powers$(0). $(br2)I, regrettably, have not earned one myself, but surely such an Item would be a marvelous Boon to any Alchemist's profession.

Addendum to the prior: I have been able to inspect this so-called "$(item)Heart of the Sea$(0)". Indeed, it seems as inert as a piece of $(item)Lapis$(0)! Some $(thing)Magic Artifact$(0) it turned out to be. If there truly were a way to $(4)unleash its hidden power$(0), it is cryptic and elusive. Perhaps in the future the $(4)same procedure to gather Power from Blaze Rods$(0) -- whatever $(thing)Marvelous Thing$(0) that turns out to be -- will work here as well.
